UpdateLog.description:
<title>Recent News</title><font>Small</font> This is the release candidate so if you encounter bugs please please please report them to me asap. Thanks! <title>Bug Fixes</title><font>Tiny</font>
- AerialVehicle that left the map at the edge in an event map would immediately teleport to their previous position upon arriving back at colony.
- AerialVehicle exiting map at edge border would create a vehicle caravan instead of an aerial vehicle object, causing vehicles not capable of caravaning to despawn immediately along with all pawns.
- AerialVehicles could launch on the world map without any pawns or pawns in non-flight roles.
- Pawns inside AerialVehicles don't show up in the colonist bar.
- Pawns in AerialVehicles aren't registered as 'alive' colonists for the game over condition.
- FloatMenuOptions and Gizmos for AerialVehicles showing incorrectly or not showing at all for certain colonies.
- Being able to trade with any settlement with an AerialVehicle.
- Graphic Overlays not rotating with the vehicle angle.
- Pawns being unable to reach vehicles at certain angles due to it using vanilla hitboxes for even-width vehicles for specific jobs.
- Compatibility issue with Combat Extended where cargo capacity of vehicles would be overwritten to 0.
<title>Performance Improvements</title><font>Tiny</font>
None for now. The mod runs quite smoothly but if anyone discovers any bottlenecks let me know and I'll fix them.
<title>Additional Changes</title><font>Tiny</font>
- Added various ITabs to AerialVehicle on the world map.
<title>Final Notes</title><font>Tiny</font> Please report any issues you find <link>https://discord.gg/zXDyfWQ</link>(discord server).
